label: Household Paper Products
description: Products used for cleaning, wiping, and personal hygiene made of paper or similar materials.

subcategories.label: Toilet Paper
subcategories.description: Soft paper used for personal hygiene after using the toilet.

subcategories.label: Facial Tissues
subcategories.description: Soft paper used for wiping the face or blowing the nose.

subcategories.label: Paper Towels
subcategories.description: Absorbent paper used for cleaning up spills or drying hands.

subcategories.label: Wet Wipes
subcategories.description: Moistened paper used for cleaning or personal hygiene.

subcategories.label: Napkins
subcategories.description: Paper or cloth used for wiping the mouth or hands during meals.
